mapper.insert: insert into ticketing_list (tl_num, tl_ti_num, tl_se_num) values (concat( concat(#{tl.tl_num}, lpad(( select count(*) from ticketing_list as t join ticketing on ti_num = t.tl_ti_num where ti_sk_num = #{sk_num})+1,3,0) ) ,(select se_name from seat where se_num = #{tl.tl_se_num})) , #{tl.tl_ti_num}, #{tl.tl_se_num})
